entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta

entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: currency handling habits of the population, amounts of money paid in and withdrawn from the currency account and its source; the daily turnover of population currency accounts
entry.dcterms:subject: economic policy
income, property and savings
economic organization
survey data
cross-section

From a list about all the banks operating in Hungary (list provided by the Hungarian National Bank) seven banks with the biggest circulation were selected. Then 23 bank branches (16 in Budapest, 7 in cities with significant tourism) were selected, in which clerks summarizing the daily currency circulation were asked to fill out a questionnaire.
self-administered questionnaire
A
